specifications.description: Fixed AG-Grid table container overflow issue causing excessive white space below vulnerability tables. Implemented elegant flexbox solution with three CSS rules: card-body as flex container, view-content with flex-grow, and vulnGrid with 100% height. Eliminated complex JavaScript height calculations in favor of natural CSS containment.
